ai-patthana15.73:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma: allows unintelligent in the Khadehaka, that is to say, the Lord of the Death,
ai-patthana15.73:0.3_0: limbs, wrapped in flowers, and so on.
ai-patthana15.73:1.1_0: causes and reasons to give rise to the teaching, without grasping.
ai-patthana15.73:2.1_0: Not grasping arises dependent on not grasping. Consciousness doesn’t arise because of not grasping.
